text.Elisabet Sobeck: This isn't a glitch, it's a catastrophe.
It's not "bad," Ted. It's apocalyptic. You built a line of killer robots -
- and you made them capable of self-replication.
Not anymore. The glitch severed chain-of-command. The only nation this swarm answers to now is itself.
Everything else is just food. And at the rate it's replicating, Ted, it will strip the Earth bare in fifteen months! We're not talking fall of civilization, we're talking extinction!

text.Ted Faro: I get it, Lis! So how do I stop it while it's contained?

text.Elisabet Sobeck: It's not contained! It can't be!
Right. Before the truth gets out, you mean.

text.Ted Faro: Lis, I will do anything you say! Keep working it, and whatever you recommend, I'll do!

text.Elisabet Sobeck: I'm going to hold you to that, Ted.
This datapoint is obtained automatically during the main quest Maker's End. It cannot be missed.
